title: Geometric Algebra for Computer Science
text:
Apresentação
Anotações sobre Dorst, Fontijne, e Mann (2007).




Dorst, Leo, Daniel Fontijne, e Stephen Mann. 2007. Geometric Algebra for Computer Science: an Object-oriented Approach to Geometry. The Morgan Kaufmann Series em Computer Graphics. Morgan Kaufmann. https://geometricalgebra.org/.
